title: The Axe Of Thunder
opening: Following Elffin's lead, Roy headed for the cave near Jutes to find the Divine Weapon hidden there. Little did they know that they weren't the only ones who knew about the cave...

intro.speaker: Gelero
intro.line: This is the end of the caaave? Treasuuure… Where are yooouu…? Answer meee...

intro.speaker: Bandit 1
intro.line: Boss... Are you sure about this? The men from Bern just told us to block the entrance. If they catch us now, they'll surely have us back in chains!

intro.speaker: Gelero
intro.line: You foooool! We'll do as we're told in tiiime… They'll never know that we took the treasuuure… If we block the entrance without taking the treasure, it's all the same anywaaay… Do you really want that poor treasure trapped in here for all eternityyy?

intro.speaker: Bandit 1
intro.line: Well. when you put it that way... I guess you're right.

intro.speaker: Bandit 2
intro.line: Boss! There's an army stationed outside the cave!

intro.speaker: Gelero
intro.line: Whaaat? They want to take our treasure, do theeey? Have the boys near the entrance take them ooouut… And grab all the treasure cheeests… We rightfully stole them fiiirst!

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: A legendary weapon lies in this cave...? It's so dark in here.

intro.speaker: Elffin
intro.line: According to the scholar in Jutes I spoke to, the legendary weapon in this cave is most likely the Tunder Axe, Armads.

intro.speaker: Elffin
intro.line: Armads was wielded by Durban the Berserker, who was said to be a colossus of a man. A single blow from his axe surely made short work of any opponent.

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: Elffin, you seem to know a lot about the Eight Legends and their weapons

intro.speaker: Elffin
intro.line: I'm a bard. It is my job to know myths and legends.

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: I'd like to hear some of them when we have the time.

intro.speaker: Elffin
intro.line: Of course. ...Lord Roy, it seems we are not alone in this cave.

intro.speaker: Elffin
intro.line: There are also noxious fumes coming from the cave walls. We must tread lightly.

end.speaker: Elffin
end.line: Hmm... I hear wind blowing from behind the throne.

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: What? I can't hear it... A niche... between the floor and the wall. Oh! It opened! ...So this is the legendary weapon? This axe is enormous.

end.speaker: Elffin
end.line: Armads… The very axe wielded by Durban the Berserker. It certainly appears fit for a warrior of his stature.

end.speaker: Soldier
end.line: R-report! I have a message from Etruria... A revolution has broken out in Aquleia, the capital of Etruria.

end.speaker: Soldier
end.line: The ones leading the revolution are High Chancellor Roartz and Lord Arcard. They have captured King Mordred. They also say they plan to divided dominion of the continent between Bern and Etruria!

end.speaker: Merlinus
end.line: The two strongest nations in Elibe joining forces...

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: Is General Cecilia all right?! And what of Princess Guinivere...

end.speaker: Soldier
end.line: We don't have any current information... But the three Etrurian Generals have parted ways and are working separately. Mage General Cecilia has fled Aquleia for the Missur Peninsula in the southwest.

end.speaker: Soldier
end.line: They're with the revolutionaries against their will because the king was taken hostage.

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: We need to contact General Cecilia... Princess Guinivere… Please be safe...
